Flowsheets

This window shows the flowsheets available in the template. You can perform the following tasks:

l Set the configuration options that are common to all flowsheets.

Configure available flowsheet resolutions

Configure the position of the current time column

Configure the option to validate real-time data

Show total or incremental values for cumulative fluid output

Configure how orders are displayed

Configure drip dose display

Configure row filters

l Create a new flowsheet or modify an existing one.

Create a custom flowsheet and set basic properties

Modify basic properties of a standard or custom flowsheet

Create or edit a tabular flowsheet section

Create or edit a trend section on a flowsheet

Delete a flowsheet section

Delete a trend

Rearrange sections on a custom flowsheet

l Delete a custom flowsheet.

Delete a custom flowsheet

l Change the order of flowsheets on the Navigation bar and Flowsheets menu.

Change the order of flowsheets in the application
